EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Oklahoma City Workshop_Q415.OK Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you on Tuesday, 10/27 at the Cloud Platform Seminar in OKC!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Platform Seminar, hosted by Pivotal, Pinnacle and EMC coming up next Tuesday in Oklahoma City. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your wifi-enabled laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Cloud Platform Seminar Tuesday, October 27, 2015 12:00pm - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Seminar Agenda
LOCATION Colcord Hotel 15 N. Robinson Ave. Oklahoma City, OK 73102 Map & Driving Directions
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest! - A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io <https://run.pivotal.io>
QUESTIONS? Contact Todd Williams at twilliams@pivotal.io <mailto:twilliams@pivotal.io>
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the seminar details & registration <https://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/oklahoma>.
